author: marinakolosova
body:
This is a fix to PR [416555](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41655/)

* After discussing with @missirol, the ParticleNet monitoring should only be in HLTMonitor sequences.
* After discussing with @rgerosa and Stephane Cooperstein, we decided to revert to using CHS jets. The PNet training used currently in the DQM (older training) is not supported for Puppi, only for CHS jets. The new training for 13-0-X is only evaluated at the MiniAOD level, not at RECO, and for this reason, we revert to using CHS jets for the DQM monitoring.

Backports needed in:
CMSSW_13_1_X
CMSSW_13_0_X
title: Reverting to AK4 CHS jets for DQM PNet monitoring
